title: Implement Debounce Function
description:
## Problem

Implement a `debounce` function that delays invoking a function until after a specified wait time has elapsed since the last time it was invoked.

## Requirements

1. Returns a debounced function
2. The debounced function delays invocation by `wait` milliseconds
3. If called again before wait expires, reset the timer
4. Should work with any function and preserve `this` context

## Example

```javascript
const debouncedFn = debounce(expensiveCall, 300);
debouncedFn(); // Won't execute immediately
debouncedFn(); // Resets timer
// After 300ms of no calls, expensiveCall executes once
```

## Hints

- Use `setTimeout` and `clearTimeout`
- Use a closure to store the timeout ID
